item.title: Product Research for Our Product-vapor barrier - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for advice from real customers to improve our product and service. Our products are crawl space vapor barriers. You need capture images and videos of our Amazon products with your mobile phone. No complete skills are required, simply take3-5shots with your phone, and shoot a short 30-135 seconds showcase.

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 20, 2024 02:28 UTC
Category: Product & Industrial Design
Skills:Product Development, Review or Feedback Collection, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Writing
Skills: Product Development, Review or Feedback Collection, Photo Editing, Video Editing, Writing
Country: China

item.title: REMOTE Blender Animator for 2,000,000 sub YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We run multiple YouTube channels with over 2,000,000 subscribers in total and hundreds of millions of views. And we are offering a stable, full-time, remote animation position.

With us, there is plenty of consistent work, tons of room to grow, with people who are easy to work with.

You must be good at Blender.

Here is the animation style we’re looking for: https://youtu.be/hHG1wva1B0w

If this job interests you, apply ASAP because we're expecting a lot of applicants.

There is only one position available.


*READ EVERYTHING BEFORE APPLYING*

Here’s EXACTLY who we’re looking for:
Everything mentioned is here for a reason and is required.

Soft skills:
- Fluent in English, both written and spoken
- Artistic and creative in video editing and animations
- Ability to receive feedback and follow instructions
- EXTREME ATTENTION TO DETAILS
- Fast response times
- Be able to use common sense to figure out problems on your own
- Be able to learn new things quickly
- Extremely organized

Technical skills (you need ALL of these skills):
- Intermediate knowledge of Blender
- After Effects and Premiere Pro is a bonus

Other requirements:
- A strong computer that is able to edit videos
- At least a quad-core CPU with a dedicated GPU is recommended
- Fast wifi, including fast upload speed if available in your area
- Accurate/good headphones or speakers

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 02:16 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Blender, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Skills: Blender, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a podcast video editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor who is experienced with editing full podcast episodes that contain audio and video, as well as making clips.

Must be fluent in English and provide examples of your work working with podcasts.

One of our podcasts deals with mature subject matter and may contain 18+ language.

Hourly Range: $35.00-$75.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 02:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
